subTitle: Explore my portfolio showcasing diverse web projects highlighting creativity, functionality, and technical expertise.

featured.title: ShadowSuite
featured.subtitle: Cybersecurity / Next.js Platform
featured.description: A secure and modern cybersecurity marketplace platform built for an Indian client. Users can explore, evaluate, and purchase specialized cybersecurity tools with a polished and professional UI.
features: Developed a complete cybersecurity marketplace with secure product browsing.
Integrated WhatsApp-based instant client communication.
Implemented dynamic product pages with interactive sections.

fullStackProject.title: Basit Sanitary Store
fullStackProject.subtitle: Full-Stack E-commerce Website
fullStackProject.description: A complete full-stack e-commerce platform specializing in sanitary products. Features include browsing, filtering, cart, user accounts, admin dashboard, and full backend integration.
features: Fully functional product browsing and search.
User authentication and account management.
Admin dashboard for inventory and analytics.
Secure backend built with REST APIs and MySQL.
